---
id: freight-upload-freight-attachment
title: "Upload freight attachments"
description: "Upload one or more Base64-encoded documents (e.g. CMR, packing list, photos) to an existing freight identified by its Swipload reference."

---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Upload freight attachments"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/freight/{reference}/attachment"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Upload one or more Base64-encoded documents (e.g. CMR, packing list, photos) to an existing freight identified by its Swipload reference.
